PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TubeBundleTypeFinned
PropertySetDef.Definition: Finned tube bundle type attributes. Contains the attributes related to the fins attached to a tube in a finned tube bundle such as is commonly found in coils.

PropertyDef.Name: Spacing
PropertyDef.Definition: Distance between fins on a tube in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: Thickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal overall thickness of the course. The size information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In cases of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the size...?

PropertyDef.Name: ThermalConductivity
PropertyDef.Definition: The rate at which thermal energy is transmitted through the material.

PropertyDef.Name: Length
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal length of the transition section. The size information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In cases of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the size properties, provided in the attached property set, the geometric parameters take precedence.

PropertyDef.Name: Height
PropertyDef.Definition: Height of the object. It is the upper hight of the railing above the floor or stair. The size information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In cases of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the size properties, provided in the attached property set, the geometric parameters take precedence.

PropertyDef.Name: Diameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Diameter of the object. It is the diameter of the handrail of the railing. The size information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In cases of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the size properties, provided in the attached property set, the geometric parameters take precedence. Here the diameter of the hand or guardrail within the railing.

PropertyDef.Name: FinCorrugatedType
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of a fin corrugated type.

PropertyDef.Name: HasCoating
PropertyDef.Definition: TRUE if the fin has a coating, FALSE if it does not.
